description:
Our lawyers have been recognized by our peers with an AV Preeminent rating by Martindale-Hubbell*, the highest rating for legal ability and ethics. In matters of personal injury law, the attorneys at the law firm of Luxenberg Garbett Kelly George, P.C., located in Beaver Falls, Pennsylvania, and representing clients throughout the state, provide compassionate, and cost-effective legal services. With no recovery fee, our clients incur no financial risk when securing our services. As lawyers that live and work in your community, we understand that you need representation that fits you, your family and the unique circumstances of your case.

While other firms may look at potential clients as a dollar sign, we view the people who come through our doors for who they are: our friends, family and neighbors. At Luxenberg Garbett Kelly George, P.C., we believe in a client-focused approach to personal injury law. For more than 80 years, our standard of professionalism, integrity and drive to provide strong legal counsel have earned our firm the respect of our peers.

No matter the circumstances of your personal injury case, our lawyers will investigate the details, gather evidence and build a case that helps you achieve the standard of justice you deserve. Reach out to the western Pennsylvania law offices of Luxenberg Garbett Kelly George, P.C. We don’t represent case numbers; we defend our friends and neighbors.

* AV Preeminent and BV Distinguished are certification marks of Reed Elsevier Properties Inc., used in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the confidential opinions of members of the Bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell ratings fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
